CustomField.description: Percentage of overall volume attributed to CRC. (Residential Sales CA)
CustomField.formula: IF(CRS_Volume_CRC__c = 0, 0, CRS_Volume_CRC__c / (CRS_Volume_IKO__c + CRS_Volume_CRC__c + CRS_Volume_BP__c + CRS_Volume_GAF__c + CRS_Volume_CT__c + CRS_Volume_OC__c + CRS_Volume_Pabco__c + CRS_Volume_MLRKY__c) )
CustomField.label: % CRC
